column1: Little Goat Diner////Wow what a restaurant. Great
column2: cordial and quick service; even with a packed house. Food was awesome! The fried pork chop sandwich was delicious. Order the fried pickles and onions; to die for. And the waffles with fried chicken had us coming back again the next day for more. Great restaurant
column6: long wait restaurant down the street: Au Cheval. What a difference. Even got the T-Shirt!!
